product_name: ERGObaby Designer Collection Diaper Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Far more than a diaper bag, the ERGObaby Designer Collection Diaper Bag is a modern mom's answer to carrying a laptop, iPad, bottles, diapers and wipes in one fashionable carrier. ERGObaby works with The Collaborative Group, an organization that helps women find sustainable employment, to source designs from regions served by Every Mother Counts. This authentic African fabric features the "Umba" pattern created by Chantal, a businesswoman in Togo, who provides for her family through textile design. Insulated bottle storage pockets. Padded laptop compartment. Interior organizer for wipes, bottles and toys. Removable changing pad. Closeout.
short_description: Far more than a diaper bag, the ERGObaby Designer Collection Diaper Bag is a modern mom's answer to carrying a laptop, iPad, bottles, diapers and wipes in one fashionable carrier.
